Top Three Links You Must Click On From the Wires Seattle Lighting Receives First Batch of VU1 ESL Energy Efficient Light Bulbs By: Marketwire . Jan. 13, 2011 05:43 PM SEATTLE, WA -- (Marketwire) -- 01/13/11 -- Following delivery of the first batch of ESL R30 bulbs from VU1 we are currently continuing laboratory testing to ensure that the product reaches our exacting standards. As this product is a totally new type of lighting, the tests and feedback to VU1 are taking longer than anticipated. However we are very pleased thus far with the results and remain extremely excited that we will be the first distributor to offer what we believe to be a major advancement in energy efficient lighting. On completion of the tests we will be informing all our customers of the revised delivery date. About Seattle Lighting: Seattle Lighting (a DBA of Dolan NW LLC) is a major distributor of lighting products with operations in Washington, Oregon and Idaho and an online presence with the name Destination Lighting (www.DestinationLighting.com). Seattle Lighting does business with over 300 industry vendors and direct imports products under their trade name of Design Classics. Seattle Lighting has large distribution facilities in Seattle WA and Portland OR. Published Jan. 13, 2011 Copyright © 2011 SYS-CON Media, Inc. — All Rights Reserved.
